import React from 'react'; import editAvatar from '../images/editAvatar.svg'; function Main() { function handleEditAvatarClick(e) { e.preventDefault(); const avatarPopup = document.querySelector('.popup_avatar'); const profileAvatar = document.querySelector('.profile__avatar'); avatarPopup.addEventListener('click', () => { avatarPopup.classList.add('popup_is-opened'); }) } return (
